title: Instructional Design Strategies Based on Document Analysis for Virtual Education Quality Assurance

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and knowledge of secondary-level science education
context.additional_context: Exploring policies and operational strategies to improve the quality of virtual educational environments for science teachers

learning_goals: Identify three quality criteria analysis frameworks for virtual education programs.
Propose at least three strategies to enhance teacher competencies in digital learning environments.
They can develop policy improvements to enhance accessibility, continuity, and graduation rates in student learning processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
